entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:13 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:13 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
